about.description: Thank you for visiting my portfolio! Here, you’ll find some of my favorite projects and the exciting work I’m currently diving into. I’m Jay Rivera, a Data Scientist with a passion for machine learning, data analytics, and model development.

projects.title: Customer Persona Model
projects.description: A machine learning model to identify key customer personas from Salesforce data, leveraging classification and clustering techniques.

projects.title: Sales Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: A Python-based dashboard for visualizing and analyzing sales data to improve decision-making.
